branchCategory.name: Rotary Table
branchCategory.description: The LER rotary electric actuator series features a rotating worktable positioned above an enclosure for the motor and drive train. Three different motor/table sizes for this rotary electric actuator are available, with each size offering a basic and high torque variation. Additionally, each size offers four rotating angle options, including 90°, 180°, 310 / 320°, and continuously rotating.

branchItem.name: LER, Electric Rotary Table
branchItem.description: The original LER is capable of 90°, 180°, or 310 / 320° rotation from the home position. Suitable applications will require a repetitive rotate-and-return motion, such as parts transfer with reorientation.

branchItem.name: LER, Electric Rotary Table, Continuous Rotation
branchItem.description: <P>The LER rotary electric actuators feature a rotating worktable positioned above an enclosure for the motor and drivetrain. Three different motor/table sizes are available, with each size offering a basic and high torque variation. Additionally, each size offers four rotating angle options, including 90°, 180°, 310 / 320°, and continuously rotating. </P>
